latfun.hsl_2d

latfun.hsl_2d(bravais_lattice, k_1, k_2, n=100, points='default')

High Symmetry Lines for 2D lattices.

Parameters:
bravais_lattice{‘tp’, ‘hp’}

Bravais lattice.

k_1, k_2ndarray

Primitive vectors in reciprocal space. Each with shape (2,).

nint, default = 100

Number of points per line [for the total of n*(len(points)-1)+1 points].

pointsstr, default = ‘default’

Order of High Symmetry Points (HSP) for HSL. For each Bravais lattice this can assume some default values.

Returns:
kx, kyndarray

Coordinates along HSL.

kndarray

Auxiliary variable corresponding to coordinates (kx, ky) with appropriately scaled distances. Same size as kx (ky). In units of [1/2 length of k_1].
